sqlMap.select:
SELECT NVL(SUM(APNOAMT),0) AS APNOAMT ,NVL(SUM(DATAAMT),0) AS DATAAMT ,NVL(SUM(ISSUEAMT),0) AS ISSUEAMT ,NVL(SUM(OTHERAAMT),0) AS OTHERAAMT ,NVL(SUM(OTHERBAMT),0) AS OTHERBAMT ,NVL(SUM(MITRATE),0) AS MITRATE ,NVL(SUM(OFFSETAMT),0) AS OFFSETAMT ,NVL(SUM(COMPENAMT),0) AS COMPENAMT ,NVL(SUM(INHERITORAMT),0) AS INHERITORAMT ,NVL(SUM(ITRTTAX),0) AS ITRTTAX ,NVL(SUM(OTHERAMT),0) AS OTHERAMT ,ISSUTYP ,PAYTYP ,CHKDATE ,RPTNOTE ,CPRNDATE FROM BAPAYRPTSUM WHERE RPTTYP = '1' AND ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND PAYCODE LIKE #payCode:VARCHAR#||'%' AND CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR#
AND 1 = 0
BENEVTREL = #benEvtRel:VARCHAR#
(
BENEVTREL in
BENEVTREL not in
#benEvtRel[]#
OR TRIM(BENEVTREL) IS NULL
)
GROUP BY PAYTYP,ISSUTYP,RPTNOTE,CHKDATE,CPRNDATE ORDER BY PAYTYP,ISSUTYP,CHKDATE

SELECT NVL(SUM(APNOAMT),0) AS APNOAMT ,NVL(SUM(DATAAMT),0) AS DATAAMT ,NVL(SUM(ISSUEAMT),0) AS ISSUEAMT ,NVL(SUM(OTHERAAMT),0) AS OTHERAAMT ,NVL(SUM(OTHERBAMT),0) AS OTHERBAMT ,NVL(SUM(MITRATE),0) AS MITRATE ,NVL(SUM(OFFSETAMT),0) AS OFFSETAMT ,NVL(SUM(COMPENAMT),0) AS COMPENAMT ,NVL(SUM(INHERITORAMT),0) AS INHERITORAMT ,NVL(SUM(ITRTTAX),0) AS ITRTTAX ,NVL(SUM(OTHERAMT),0) AS OTHERAMT ,ISSUTYP ,PAYTYP ,CHKDATE ,RPTNOTE ,NVL(TRIM(NLWKMK), '') AS NLWKMK ,NVL(TRIM(ADWKMK), '') AS ADWKMK ,NACHGMK ,CPRNDATE FROM BAPAYRPTSUM WHERE RPTTYP = '1' AND ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND PAYCODE LIKE #payCode:VARCHAR#||'%' AND CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# AND PAYSEQNO = #paySeqNo:VARCHAR#
AND 1 = 0
BENEVTREL = #benEvtRel:VARCHAR#
(
BENEVTREL in
BENEVTREL not in
#benEvtRel[]#
OR TRIM(BENEVTREL) IS NULL )
(
NVL(TRIM(NACHGMK),' ') = ' '
NVL(TRIM(NACHGMK),' ') != ' '
OR TRIM(NACHGMK) IS NULL
OR TRIM(NACHGMK) IS NOT NULL
)
GROUP BY NACHGMK, NLWKMK, ADWKMK, PAYTYP, ISSUTYP, RPTNOTE, CHKDATE,CPRNDATE ORDER BY NACHGMK, NLWKMK, ADWKMK, PAYTYP, ISSUTYP, CHKDATE

SELECT NVL(SUM(APNOAMT),0) AS APNOAMT ,NVL(SUM(DATAAMT),0) AS DATAAMT ,NVL(SUM(ISSUEAMT),0) AS ISSUEAMT ,NVL(SUM(OTHERAAMT),0) AS OTHERAAMT ,NVL(SUM(OTHERBAMT),0) AS OTHERBAMT ,NVL(SUM(MITRATE),0) AS MITRATE ,NVL(SUM(OFFSETAMT),0) AS OFFSETAMT ,NVL(SUM(COMPENAMT),0) AS COMPENAMT ,NVL(SUM(INHERITORAMT),0) AS INHERITORAMT ,NVL(SUM(ITRTTAX),0) AS ITRTTAX ,NVL(SUM(OTHERAMT),0) AS OTHERAMT ,ISSUTYP ,PAYTYP ,CHKDATE ,RPTNOTE ,NVL(TRIM(NLWKMK), '') AS NLWKMK ,NVL(TRIM(ADWKMK), '') AS ADWKMK ,NACHGMK ,CPRNDATE FROM BAPAYRPTSUM WHERE RPTTYP = '1' AND ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND PAYCODE LIKE #payCode:VARCHAR#||'%' AND CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR#
AND 1 = 0
BENEVTREL = #benEvtRel:VARCHAR#
(
BENEVTREL in
BENEVTREL not in
#benEvtRel[]#
OR TRIM(BENEVTREL) IS NULL )
(
NVL(TRIM(NACHGMK),' ') = ' '
NVL(TRIM(NACHGMK),' ') != ' '
OR TRIM(NACHGMK) IS NULL
OR TRIM(NACHGMK) IS NOT NULL
)
GROUP BY NACHGMK, NLWKMK, ADWKMK, PAYTYP, ISSUTYP, RPTNOTE, CHKDATE, CPRNDATE ORDER BY NACHGMK, NLWKMK, ADWKMK, PAYTYP, ISSUTYP, CHKDATE

SELECT NVL(APNOAMT,0) AS APNOAMT ,NVL(DATAAMT,0) AS DATAAMT ,NVL(ISSUEAMT,0) AS ISSUEAMT ,NVL(OTHERAAMT,0) AS OTHERAAMT ,NVL(OTHERBAMT,0) AS OTHERBAMT ,NVL(MITRATE,0) AS MITRATE ,NVL(OFFSETAMT,0) AS OFFSETAMT ,NVL(COMPENAMT,0) AS COMPENAMT ,NVL(INHERITORAMT,0) AS INHERITORAMT ,NVL(ITRTTAX,0) AS ITRTTAX ,NVL(OTHERAMT,0) AS OTHERAMT ,ISSUTYP ,PAYTYP ,CHKDATE ,CPRNDATE ,NVL(TRIM(NLWKMK), '') AS NLWKMK ,NVL(TRIM(ADWKMK), '') AS ADWKMK ,NACHGMK FROM BAPAYRPTSUM WHERE RPTTYP = '5' AND ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND PAYCODE LIKE #payCode:VARCHAR#||'%' AND CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# ORDER BY PAYTYP,ISSUTYP,CHKDATE

SELECT NVL(SUM(APNOAMT),0) AS APNOAMT ,NVL(SUM(DATAAMT),0) AS DATAAMT ,NVL(SUM(ISSUEAMT),0) AS ISSUEAMT ,NVL(SUM(OTHERAAMT),0) AS OTHERAAMT ,NVL(SUM(OTHERBAMT),0) AS OTHERBAMT ,NVL(SUM(MITRATE),0) AS MITRATE ,NVL(SUM(OFFSETAMT),0) AS OFFSETAMT ,NVL(SUM(COMPENAMT),0) AS COMPENAMT ,NVL(SUM(INHERITORAMT),0) AS INHERITORAMT ,NVL(SUM(ITRTTAX),0) AS ITRTTAX ,NVL(SUM(OTHERAMT),0) AS OTHERAMT ,ISSUTYP ,PAYTYP ,CHKDATE ,CPRNDATE ,NVL(TRIM(NLWKMK), '') AS NLWKMK ,NVL(TRIM(ADWKMK), '') AS ADWKMK ,NACHGMK FROM BAPAYRPTSUM WHERE RPTTYP = '6' AND ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND PAYCODE LIKE #payCode:VARCHAR#||'%' AND CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# GROUP BY PAYTYP,ISSUTYP,CHKDATE,CPRNDATE,NLWKMK,ADWKMK,NACHGMK ORDER BY PAYTYP,ISSUTYP,CHKDATE

SELECT NVL(SUM(APNOAMT),0) AS APNOAMT ,NVL(SUM(DATAAMT),0) AS DATAAMT ,NVL(SUM(ISSUEAMT),0) AS ISSUEAMT ,NVL(SUM(OTHERAAMT),0) AS OTHERAAMT ,NVL(SUM(OTHERBAMT),0) AS OTHERBAMT ,NVL(SUM(MITRATE),0) AS MITRATE ,NVL(SUM(OFFSETAMT),0) AS OFFSETAMT ,NVL(SUM(COMPENAMT),0) AS COMPENAMT ,NVL(SUM(INHERITORAMT),0) AS INHERITORAMT ,NVL(SUM(ITRTTAX),0) AS ITRTTAX ,NVL(SUM(OTHERAMT),0) AS OTHERAMT ,ISSUTYP ,PAYTYP ,CHKDATE ,NVL(TRIM(NLWKMK), '') AS NLWKMK ,NVL(TRIM(ADWKMK), '') AS ADWKMK ,NACHGMK ,CPRNDATE FROM BAPAYRPTSUM WHERE RPTTYP = '8' AND ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND PAYCODE LIKE #payCode:VARCHAR#||'%' AND CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR#
AND 1 = 0
PAYSEQNO = #paySeqNo:VARCHAR#
(
NVL(TRIM(NACHGMK),' ') = ' '
NVL(TRIM(NACHGMK),' ') != ' '
OR TRIM(NACHGMK) IS NULL
OR TRIM(NACHGMK) IS NOT NULL
)
AND ISSUTYP <> 'F'
GROUP BY PAYTYP,ISSUTYP,CHKDATE, NLWKMK, ADWKMK, NACHGMK, CPRNDATE ORDER BY NACHGMK, NLWKMK, ADWKMK, PAYTYP, ISSUTYP, CHKDATE

SELECT APNOAMT ,DATAAMT ,ISSUEAMT ,UNACPAMT ,CHKDATE ,NLWKMK ,ADWKMK ,NACHGMK ,CPRNDATE FROM BAPAYRPTSUM WHERE RPTTYP = '7' AND ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND PAYCODE LIKE #payCode:VARCHAR#||'%' AND CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR#
AND 1 = 0
PAYSEQNO = #paySeqNo:VARCHAR#
(
NVL(TRIM(NACHGMK),' ') = ' '
NVL(TRIM(NACHGMK),' ') != ' '
OR TRIM(NACHGMK) IS NULL
OR TRIM(NACHGMK) IS NOT NULL
)
ORDER BY NACHGMK, NLWKMK, ADWKMK, PAYTYP, ISSUTYP, CHKDATE

SELECT NVL(SUM(APNOAMT),0) AS APNOAMT ,NVL(SUM(DATAAMT),0) AS DATAAMT ,NVL(SUM(ISSUEAMT),0) AS ISSUEAMT ,NVL(SUM(OTHERAAMT),0) AS OTHERAAMT ,NVL(SUM(OTHERBAMT),0) AS OTHERBAMT ,NVL(SUM(MITRATE),0) AS MITRATE ,NVL(SUM(OFFSETAMT),0) AS OFFSETAMT ,NVL(SUM(COMPENAMT),0) AS COMPENAMT ,NVL(SUM(INHERITORAMT),0) AS INHERITORAMT ,NVL(SUM(ITRTTAX),0) AS ITRTTAX ,NVL(SUM(OTHERAMT),0) AS OTHERAMT ,ISSUTYP ,PAYTYP ,CHKDATE ,CPRNDATE ,NVL(TRIM(NLWKMK), '') AS NLWKMK ,NVL(TRIM(ADWKMK), '') AS ADWKMK ,NACHGMK FROM BAPAYRPTSUM WHERE RPTTYP = #rptTyp:VARCHAR# AND APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# AND APSEQNO = #apSeqNo:VARCHAR#
AND 1 = 0
PAYSEQNO = #paySeqNo:VARCHAR#
AND ISSUTYP <> 'F'
GROUP BY PAYTYP, ISSUTYP, CHKDATE, CPRNDATE, NLWKMK, ADWKMK, NACHGMK ORDER BY NACHGMK, NLWKMK, ADWKMK, PAYTYP, ISSUTYP, CHKDATE

SELECT NVL(SUM(APNOAMT),0) AS APNOAMT ,NVL(SUM(DATAAMT),0) AS DATAAMT ,NVL(SUM(ISSUEAMT),0) AS ISSUEAMT ,NVL(SUM(OTHERAAMT),0) AS OTHERAAMT ,NVL(SUM(OTHERBAMT),0) AS OTHERBAMT ,NVL(SUM(MITRATE),0) AS MITRATE ,NVL(SUM(OFFSETAMT),0) AS OFFSETAMT ,NVL(SUM(COMPENAMT),0) AS COMPENAMT ,NVL(SUM(INHERITORAMT),0) AS INHERITORAMT ,NVL(SUM(ITRTTAX),0) AS ITRTTAX ,NVL(SUM(OTHERAMT),0) AS OTHERAMT ,ISSUTYP ,PAYTYP ,CHKDATE ,CPRNDATE ,NVL(TRIM(NLWKMK), '') AS NLWKMK ,NVL(TRIM(ADWKMK), '') AS ADWKMK ,NACHGMK FROM BAPAYRPTSUM WHERE RPTTYP = #rptTyp:VARCHAR# AND APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# AND APSEQNO = #apSeqNo:VARCHAR#
AND 1 = 0
PAYSEQNO = #paySeqNo:VARCHAR#
AND ISSUTYP <> 'F'
GROUP BY PAYTYP, ISSUTYP, CHKDATE, NLWKMK, ADWKMK, NACHGMK, CPRNDATE ORDER BY NACHGMK, NLWKMK, ADWKMK, PAYTYP, ISSUTYP, CHKDATE

SELECT NVL(SUM(APNOAMT),0) AS APNOAMT ,NVL(SUM(DATAAMT),0) AS DATAAMT ,NVL(SUM(ISSUEAMT),0) AS ISSUEAMT ,NVL(SUM(OTHERAAMT),0) AS OTHERAAMT ,NVL(SUM(OTHERBAMT),0) AS OTHERBAMT ,NVL(SUM(MITRATE),0) AS MITRATE ,NVL(SUM(OFFSETAMT),0) AS OFFSETAMT ,NVL(SUM(COMPENAMT),0) AS COMPENAMT ,NVL(SUM(INHERITORAMT),0) AS INHERITORAMT ,NVL(SUM(ITRTTAX),0) AS ITRTTAX ,NVL(SUM(OTHERAMT),0) AS OTHERAMT ,ISSUTYP ,PAYTYP ,CHKDATE ,NVL(TRIM(NLWKMK), '') AS NLWKMK ,NVL(TRIM(ADWKMK), '') AS ADWKMK ,NACHGMK ,CPRNDATE FROM BAPAYRPTSUM WHERE RPTTYP = '19' AND ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND PAYCODE LIKE #payCode:VARCHAR#||'%' AND CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR#
AND 1 = 0
PAYSEQNO = #paySeqNo:VARCHAR#
(
NVL(TRIM(NACHGMK),' ') = ' '
NVL(TRIM(NACHGMK),' ') != ' '
OR TRIM(NACHGMK) IS NULL
OR TRIM(NACHGMK) IS NOT NULL
)
AND ISSUTYP <> 'F'
GROUP BY PAYTYP,ISSUTYP,CHKDATE, NLWKMK, ADWKMK, NACHGMK, CPRNDATE ORDER BY NACHGMK, NLWKMK, ADWKMK, PAYTYP, ISSUTYP, CHKDATE

SELECT APNOAMT ,DATAAMT ,ISSUEAMT ,UNACPAMT ,CHKDATE ,NLWKMK ,ADWKMK ,NACHGMK ,CPRNDATE FROM BAPAYRPTSUM WHERE RPTTYP = '16' AND CPRNDATE = #cPrnDate:VARCHAR# AND ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND PAYCODE LIKE #payCode:VARCHAR#||'%'
AND 1 = 0
PAYSEQNO = #paySeqNo:VARCHAR#
(
NVL(TRIM(NACHGMK),' ') = ' '
NVL(TRIM(NACHGMK),' ') != ' '
OR TRIM(NACHGMK) IS NULL
OR TRIM(NACHGMK) IS NOT NULL
)
ORDER BY NACHGMK, NLWKMK, ADWKMK, PAYTYP, ISSUTYP, CHKDATE

SELECT APNOAMT ,DATAAMT ,ISSUEAMT ,UNACPAMT ,CHKDATE ,NLWKMK ,ADWKMK ,NACHGMK ,CPRNDATE FROM BAPAYRPTSUM WHERE RPTTYP = '16' AND CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# AND PAYCODE LIKE #payCode:VARCHAR#||'%'
AND 1 = 0
(
NVL(TRIM(NACHGMK),' ') = ' '
NVL(TRIM(NACHGMK),' ') != ' '
OR TRIM(NACHGMK) IS NULL
OR TRIM(NACHGMK) IS NOT NULL
)
ORDER BY NACHGMK, NLWKMK, ADWKMK, PAYTYP, ISSUTYP, CHKDATE

SELECT APNOAMT ,DATAAMT ,ISSUEAMT ,UNACPAMT ,CHKDATE ,NLWKMK ,ADWKMK ,NACHGMK ,CPRNDATE FROM BAPAYRPTSUM WHERE RPTTYP = '17' AND ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND CPRNDATE = #cPrnDate:VARCHAR# AND PAYCODE LIKE #payCode:VARCHAR#||'%'
AND 1 = 0
APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
PAYSEQNO = #paySeqNo:VARCHAR#
(
NVL(TRIM(NACHGMK),' ') = ' '
NVL(TRIM(NACHGMK),' ') != ' '
OR TRIM(NACHGMK) IS NULL
OR TRIM(NACHGMK) IS NOT NULL
)
ORDER BY NACHGMK, NLWKMK, ADWKMK, PAYTYP, ISSUTYP, CHKDATE

SELECT APNOAMT ,DATAAMT ,ISSUEAMT ,UNACPAMT ,CHKDATE ,NLWKMK ,ADWKMK ,NACHGMK ,CPRNDATE FROM BAPAYRPTSUM WHERE RPTTYP = '17' AND CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# AND PAYCODE LIKE #payCode:VARCHAR#||'%'
AND 1 = 0
PAYSEQNO = #paySeqNo:VARCHAR#
(
NVL(TRIM(NACHGMK),' ') = ' '
NVL(TRIM(NACHGMK),' ') != ' '
OR TRIM(NACHGMK) IS NULL
OR TRIM(NACHGMK) IS NOT NULL
)
ORDER BY NACHGMK, NLWKMK, ADWKMK, PAYTYP, ISSUTYP, CHKDATE
sqlMap.insert: insert into BAPAYRPTSUM ( RPTTYP ,CPRNDATE ,PAYTYP ,CHKDATE ,PAYCODE ,ISSUTYP ,ISSUYM ,BENEVTREL ,APNOAMT ,DATAAMT ,ISSUEAMT ,OTHERAAMT ,OTHERBAMT ,MITRATE ,OFFSETAMT ,COMPENAMT ,INHERITORAMT ,ITRTTAX ,OTHERAMT ,PAYAMT ,PAYSEQNO ,RPTNOTE ,PROCTIME ,CASETYP ,STS ,APNO ,APSEQNO ) values ( #rptTyp:VARCHAR# ,#cPrnDate:VARCHAR# ,#payTyp:VARCHAR# ,#chkDate:VARCHAR# ,#payCode:VARCHAR# ,#issuTyp:VARCHAR# ,#issuYm:VARCHAR# ,'' ,#apNoAmt:NUMERIC# ,#dataAmt:NUMERIC# ,#issueAmt:NUMERIC# ,#otheraAmt:NUMERIC# ,#otherbAmt:NUMERIC# ,#mitRate:NUMERIC# ,#offsetAmt:NUMERIC# ,#compenAmt:NUMERIC# ,#inherItorAmt:NUMERIC# ,#itrtTax:NUMERIC# ,#otherAmt:NUMERIC# ,#payAmt:NUMERIC# ,'' ,'' , to_Char(Sysdate,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') ,#caseTyp:VARCHAR# ,#sts:VARCHAR# ,#apNo:VARCHAR# ,#seqNo:VARCHAR# )

insert into BAPAYRPTSUM ( RPTTYP ,CPRNDATE ,PAYTYP ,CHKDATE ,PAYCODE ,ISSUTYP ,ISSUYM ,BENEVTREL ,APNOAMT ,DATAAMT ,ISSUEAMT ,OTHERAAMT ,OTHERBAMT ,MITRATE ,OFFSETAMT ,COMPENAMT ,INHERITORAMT ,ITRTTAX ,OTHERAMT ,PAYAMT ,PAYSEQNO ,RPTNOTE ,PROCTIME ,CASETYP ,STS ,APNO ,APSEQNO ) values ( #rptTyp:VARCHAR# ,#cPrnDate:VARCHAR# ,#payTyp:VARCHAR# ,#chkDate:VARCHAR# ,#payCode:VARCHAR# ,#issuTyp:VARCHAR# ,#issuYm:VARCHAR# ,'' ,#apNoAmt:NUMERIC# ,#dataAmt:NUMERIC# ,#issueAmt:NUMERIC# ,#otheraAmt:NUMERIC# ,#otherbAmt:NUMERIC# ,#mitRate:NUMERIC# ,#offsetAmt:NUMERIC# ,#compenAmt:NUMERIC# ,#inherItorAmt:NUMERIC# ,#itrtTax:NUMERIC# ,#otherAmt:NUMERIC# ,#payAmt:NUMERIC# ,'' ,#rptNote:VARCHAR# , to_Char(Sysdate,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') ,#caseTyp:VARCHAR# ,#sts:VARCHAR# ,#apNo:VARCHAR# ,#seqNo:VARCHAR# )

insert into BAPAYRPTSUM ( RPTTYP ,CPRNDATE ,PAYTYP ,CHKDATE ,PAYCODE ,ISSUTYP ,ISSUYM ,BENEVTREL ,APNOAMT ,DATAAMT ,ISSUEAMT ,OTHERAAMT ,OTHERBAMT ,MITRATE ,OFFSETAMT ,COMPENAMT ,INHERITORAMT ,ITRTTAX ,OTHERAMT ,PAYAMT ,PAYSEQNO ,RPTNOTE ,PROCTIME ,CASETYP ,NLWKMK ,ADWKMK ,NACHGMK ,STS ,APNO ,APSEQNO ) values ( #rptTyp:VARCHAR# ,#cPrnDate:VARCHAR# ,#payTyp:VARCHAR# ,#chkDate:VARCHAR# ,#payCode:VARCHAR# ,#issuTyp:VARCHAR# ,#issuYm:VARCHAR# ,'' ,#apNoAmt:NUMERIC# ,#dataAmt:NUMERIC# ,#issueAmt:NUMERIC# ,#otheraAmt:NUMERIC# ,#otherbAmt:NUMERIC# ,#mitRate:NUMERIC# ,#offsetAmt:NUMERIC# ,#compenAmt:NUMERIC# ,#inherItorAmt:NUMERIC# ,#itrtTax:NUMERIC# ,#otherAmt:NUMERIC# ,#payAmt:NUMERIC# ,'' ,'' , to_Char(Sysdate,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') ,#caseTyp:VARCHAR# ,#nlWkMk:VARCHAR# ,#adWkMk:VARCHAR# ,#naChgMk:VARCHAR# ,#sts:VARCHAR# ,#apNo:VARCHAR# ,#seqNo:VARCHAR# )

insert into BAPAYRPTSUM ( RPTTYP ,CPRNDATE ,PAYTYP ,CHKDATE ,PAYCODE ,ISSUTYP ,ISSUYM ,BENEVTREL ,APNOAMT ,DATAAMT ,ISSUEAMT ,OTHERAAMT ,OTHERBAMT ,MITRATE ,OFFSETAMT ,COMPENAMT ,INHERITORAMT ,ITRTTAX ,OTHERAMT ,PAYAMT ,PAYSEQNO ,RPTNOTE ,PROCTIME ,CASETYP ,NLWKMK ,ADWKMK ,NACHGMK ,STS ,APNO ,APSEQNO ) values ( #rptTyp:VARCHAR# ,#cPrnDate:VARCHAR# ,#payTyp:VARCHAR# ,#chkDate:VARCHAR# ,#payCode:VARCHAR# ,#issuTyp:VARCHAR# ,#issuYm:VARCHAR# ,'' ,#apNoAmt:NUMERIC# ,#dataAmt:NUMERIC# ,#issueAmt:NUMERIC# ,#otheraAmt:NUMERIC# ,#otherbAmt:NUMERIC# ,#mitRate:NUMERIC# ,#offsetAmt:NUMERIC# ,#compenAmt:NUMERIC# ,#inherItorAmt:NUMERIC# ,#itrtTax:NUMERIC# ,#otherAmt:NUMERIC# ,#payAmt:NUMERIC# ,'' ,'' , to_Char(Sysdate,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') ,#caseTyp:VARCHAR# ,#nlWkMk:VARCHAR# ,#adWkMk:VARCHAR# ,#naChgMk:VARCHAR# ,#sts:VARCHAR# ,#apNo:VARCHAR# ,#seqNo:VARCHAR# )
sqlMap.select: SELECT NVL(SUM(ISSUEAMT), 0) AS ISSUEAMT, NVL(SUM(PAYAMT), 0) AS PAYAMT, NVL(SUM(DATAAMT), 0) AS DATAAMT, CHKDATE, ISSUTYP, RPTTYP, CPRNDATE, ISSUYM, PAYTYP, NLWKMK, ADWKMK, NACHGMK, STS, APNO, APSEQNO FROM BAPAYRPTSUM WHERE RPTTYP = '18' AND PAYCODE = #payCode:VARCHAR# AND CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# AND ISSUTYP IN ('G') GROUP BY RPTTYP,PAYTYP, APNO, APSEQNO, NACHGMK, NLWKMK, ADWKMK,ISSUTYP,CHKDATE,CPRNDATE,ISSUYM,STS ORDER BY ISSUTYP,CHKDATE

SELECT NVL(SUM(ISSUEAMT), 0) AS ISSUEAMT, NVL(SUM(PAYAMT), 0) AS PAYAMT, NVL(SUM(DATAAMT), 0) AS DATAAMT, CHKDATE, ISSUTYP, RPTTYP, CPRNDATE, ISSUYM, PAYTYP, NLWKMK, ADWKMK, NACHGMK, STS, APNO, APSEQNO FROM BAPAYRPTSUM WHERE RPTTYP = '18' AND PAYCODE = #payCode:VARCHAR# AND APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND ISSUTYP IN ('E') AND RPTNOTE IN ('N') GROUP BY RPTTYP,PAYTYP, APNO, APSEQNO, NACHGMK, NLWKMK, ADWKMK,ISSUTYP,CHKDATE,CPRNDATE,ISSUYM,STS ORDER BY ISSUTYP,CHKDATE

SELECT NVL(SUM(APNOAMT),0) AS APNOAMT ,NVL(SUM(DATAAMT),0) AS DATAAMT ,NVL(SUM(ISSUEAMT),0) AS ISSUEAMT ,NVL(SUM(OTHERAAMT),0) AS OTHERAAMT ,NVL(SUM(OTHERBAMT),0) AS OTHERBAMT ,NVL(SUM(MITRATE),0) AS MITRATE ,NVL(SUM(OFFSETAMT),0) AS OFFSETAMT ,NVL(SUM(COMPENAMT),0) AS COMPENAMT ,NVL(SUM(INHERITORAMT),0) AS INHERITORAMT ,NVL(SUM(ITRTTAX),0) AS ITRTTAX ,NVL(SUM(OTHERAMT),0) AS OTHERAMT ,ISSUTYP ,PAYTYP ,CHKDATE ,CPRNDATE ,NVL(TRIM(NLWKMK), '') AS NLWKMK ,NVL(TRIM(ADWKMK), '') AS ADWKMK ,NACHGMK FROM BAPAYRPTSUM WHERE RPTTYP = #rptTyp:VARCHAR# AND PAYCODE = #payCode:VARCHAR# AND CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR#
AND 1 = 0
(
NVL(TRIM(NACHGMK),' ') = ' '
NVL(TRIM(NACHGMK),' ') != ' '
OR TRIM(NACHGMK) IS NULL
OR TRIM(NACHGMK) IS NOT NULL
)
AND ISSUTYP IN ('G') GROUP BY PAYTYP, ISSUTYP, CHKDATE, CPRNDATE, NLWKMK, ADWKMK, NACHGMK ORDER BY NACHGMK, NLWKMK, ADWKMK, PAYTYP, ISSUTYP, CHKDATE

SELECT NVL(SUM(Decode(PAYKIND,'37',0,ISSUEAMT)), 0) AS ISSUEAMTA, NVL(SUM(Decode(PAYKIND,'37',ISSUEAMT,0)), 0) AS ISSUEAMTB, NVL(SUM(Decode(PAYKIND,'37',0,ISSUEAMT)), 0) AS PAYAMTA, NVL(SUM(Decode(PAYKIND,'37',ISSUEAMT,0)), 0) AS PAYAMTB, NVL(COUNT(*), 0) AS DATAAMT, CHKDATE, NLWKMK, ADWKMK, NACHGMK, CPRNDATE, RPTTYP, ISSUTYP, PAYTYP, ISSUYM, STS FROM BAPAYRPTSUM WHERE RPTTYP = '18' AND PAYCODE = #payCode:VARCHAR# AND CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# AND ISSUTYP IN ('G') GROUP BY PAYTYP, ISSUTYP, CHKDATE, NLWKMK, ADWKMK, NACHGMK, CPRNDATE, RPTTYP, ISSUYM, STS ORDER BY ISSUTYP, CHKDATE, NLWKMK, ADWKMK, NACHGMK, CPRNDATE, RPTTYP

SELECT NVL(SUM(ISSUEAMT), 0) AS ISSUEAMT, NVL(SUM(PAYAMT), 0) AS PAYAMT, NVL(SUM(DATAAMT), 0) AS DATAAMT, CHKDATE, NLWKMK, ADWKMK, NACHGMK, CPRNDATE, RPTTYP, ISSUTYP, PAYTYP, ISSUYM, STS, APNO, APSEQNO FROM BAPAYRPTSUM WHERE RPTTYP = '18' AND PAYCODE = #payCode:VARCHAR# AND CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# AND ISSUTYP IN ('G') GROUP BY PAYTYP, ISSUTYP, APNO, APSEQNO, CHKDATE, NLWKMK, ADWKMK, NACHGMK, CPRNDATE, RPTTYP, ISSUYM, STS ORDER BY ISSUTYP, CHKDATE, NLWKMK, ADWKMK, NACHGMK, CPRNDATE, RPTTYP
sqlMap.update: update BAPAYRPTSUM t set t.RPTPAGE = #v_cprnpage:VARCHAR#, t.PROCTIME = to_Char(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') where t.RPTTYP = '18' and t.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# and t.PAYCODE = #payCode:VARCHAR# and t.CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# and (t.RPTPAGE is null or NVL(trim(t.RPTPAGE), ' ') = ' ' or NVL(trim(t.RPTPAGE), 0) = 0) and t.ISSUTYP = #issuTyp:VARCHAR#

update BAPAYRPTSUM t set t.RPTPAGE = #v_cprnpage:VARCHAR#, t.PROCTIME = to_Char(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') where t.RPTTYP = '18' and t.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# and t.PAYCODE = #payCode:VARCHAR# and t.CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# and NVL(t.NLWKMK,' ') = NVL(#nlWkMk:VARCHAR#,' ') and NVL(t.ADWKMK,' ') = NVL(#adWkMk:VARCHAR#,' ') and t.NACHGMK is null and (t.RPTPAGE is null or NVL(trim(t.RPTPAGE), ' ') = ' ' or NVL(trim(t.RPTPAGE), 0) = 0) and t.ISSUTYP = #issuTyp:VARCHAR#

update BAPAYRPTSUM t set t.RPTPAGE = #v_cprnpage:VARCHAR#, t.PROCTIME = to_Char(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') where t.RPTTYP = '18' and t.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# and t.PAYCODE = #payCode:VARCHAR# and t.CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# and NVL(t.NLWKMK,' ') = NVL(#nlWkMk:VARCHAR#,' ') and NVL(t.ADWKMK,' ') = NVL(#adWkMk:VARCHAR#,' ') and t.NACHGMK is null and (t.RPTPAGE is null or NVL(trim(t.RPTPAGE), ' ') = ' ' or NVL(trim(t.RPTPAGE), 0) = 0) and t.ISSUTYP = #issuTyp:VARCHAR#
UPDATE BAPAYRPTSUM t SET t.RPTNOTE = '' WHERE t.RPTTYP = '18' AND t.PAYCODE = #payCode:VARCHAR# AND t.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND t.ISSUTYP = 'E' AND t.RPTNOTE = 'N'
